parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Light name used internally (returned by IModelDoc2::GetLightSourceName )

parameters.name: Ambient
parameters.description: Light source ambient value

parameters.name: Diffuse
parameters.description: Light source diffuse value

parameters.name: Specular
parameters.description: Light source specular value

parameters.name: Colour
parameters.description: COLORREF color value

parameters.name: Enabled
parameters.description: True if a light is enabled, false if not

parameters.name: Fixed
parameters.description: True if a light is fixed, false if not

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: x location of the spot light

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: y location of the spot light

parameters.name: Z
parameters.description: location of the spot light target

parameters.name: Targetx
parameters.description: x location of the spot light target

parameters.name: Targety
parameters.description: y location of the spot light target

parameters.name: Targetz
parameters.description: z location of the spot light target

parameters.name: ConeAngle
parameters.description: Cone angle through which the beam spreads in degrees
